actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that each person held in slavery shall be considered to have been a citizen of the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that each person held in slavery from the founding of the Republic to the ratification of the fourteen amendment shall be considered to have been a citizen of the United States.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that each person held in slavery shall be considered to have been a citizen of the United States.
